scripts.test: cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports,overwrite=true,html=false,json=true && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline && powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'cypress\\reports\\cypress\\reports\\mochawesome.html' 'cypress\\reports\\index.html' -Force"
scripts.test:headed: cypress run --headed --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports,overwrite=true,html=false,json=true && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline && powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'cypress\\reports\\cypress\\reports\\mochawesome.html' 'cypress\\reports\\index.html' -Force"
